mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.enname AS "enname", a.is_sys AS "isSys", a.is_useable AS "isUseable", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.select: SELECT a.menu_id AS menuId FROM sys_role_menu a WHERE a.role_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_role( id, name, enname, is_sys, is_useable, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{enname}, #{isSys}, #{isUseable}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_role SET name = #{name}, enname = #{enname}, is_sys = #{isSys}, is_useable = #{isUseable}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
